PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ControllerTypeProgrammable
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties for Discrete Digital Control (DDC) or programmable logic controllers. HISTORY: Added in IFC4.

PropertyDef.Name: ControlType
PropertyDef.Definition: The type of discrete digital controller: \X\0D \X\0D PRIMARY: Controller has built-in communication interface for PC connection, may manage secondary controllers.\X\0D SECONDARY: Controller communicates with primary controller and its own managed devices.

PropertyDef.Name: FirmwareVersion
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates version of device firmware according to device manufacturer.

PropertyDef.Name: SoftwareVersion
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates version of application software according to systems integrator.
